service.description: Service to map Warehouse to Store Transfer Order Fulfillment from NetSuite in OMS. The Warehouse TOs are fulfilled by third party, and so shipments in OMS will be created in Shipped Status.

parameter.name: payload
parameter.description: The Transfer Order Fulfillment map from NetSuite to be mapped as per Shipment in OMS.

parameter.name: payload
parameter.description: The Shipment map with mapped fields for OMS.

parameter.name: payload
parameter.description: The Transfer Order Fulfillment map from NetSuite to be mapped as per Shipment in OMS.

parameter.name: payload
parameter.description: The Shipment map with mapped fields for OMS.

parameter.name: shipmentId
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Shipment details for a specific shipmentId.

parameter.name: systemMessageRemoteId
parameter.description: The System Message Remote ID to send Shipment Receipt Feed.

parameter.name: systemMessageTypeId
parameter.description: The System Message Type ID for generating Shipment Receipt Feed.

parameter.name: sinceReceivedDate
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Shipment Receipt details received after a specific date.

parameter.name: productStoreIds
parameter.description: List of product Store Ids for generating Shipment Receipt feed. For passing the Product Store Ids as list, add values like - SM_STORE,SG_STORE and for single value use - SM_STORE.

log.message: Generating Shipments Receipt Feed file for Shipment ${shipmentId} at time ${nowDate}

return.message: No eligible Transfer Order for Shipments Receipts Feed at ${nowDate}, not generating the TO Shipment Receipt Feed File for NetSuite.
Could not find SystemMessageType with ID ${systemMessageTypeId}

service-call.name: create#co.hotwax.integration.shipment.ShipmentReceiptHistory
service-call.in-map: [receiptId:shipmentReceiptItem.receiptId, comments:'Order Item sent as part of Transfer Order Shipment Receipt Feed', createdDate:nowDate]

return.message: Completed the Transfer Order Shipments Receipt Feed file at time ${ec.user.nowTimestamp} with type ${systemMessageTypeId} and remote ${systemMessageRemoteId} saved response in messages ${shipmentsReceiptFeedSysMsgOut?.systemMessageId}

service.description: Service to generate Transfer Order Shipment Feed. The Feed will be Shipment wise and each Shipment containing the list of Shipment Items.

parameter.name: systemMessageRemoteId
parameter.description: The System Message Remote ID for generating the Transfer Order Shipment Feed.

parameter.name: systemMessageTypeId
parameter.description: The System Message Type ID for generating the Transfer Order Shipment Feed.

parameter.name: orderId
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch the Transfer Order Shipment details for a specific orderId.

parameter.name: orderItemSeqId
parameter.description: Parameter to fetch Transfer Order Shipment item details for a specific orderItemSeqId.

parameter.name: parentFacilityTypeIds
parameter.description: List of parent Facility Type Ids for generating Transfer Order Shipment Feed. For passing the parent Facility Type Ids as list, add values like - PHYSICAL_STORE,DISTRIBUTION_CENTER,VIRTUAL_FACILITY and for single value use - PHYSICAL_STORE.

log.message: Generating Transfer Order Shipment Feed file of HotWax for Order ${orderId}, at time ${nowDate}

return.message: No eligible orders for Transfer Order Shipment Feed at ${nowDate}, not generating the TO Shipment Feed File for NetSuite.
Could not find SystemMessageType with ID ${systemMessageTypeId}

service-call.name: create#co.hotwax.integration.order.OrderFulfillmentHistory
service-call.in-map: [orderId:shipmentItem.orderId, orderItemSeqId:shipmentItem.orderItemSeqId, shipmentId:shipmentItem.shipmentId, externalFulfillmentId:'_NA_', comments:'Transfer Order Shipment Item sent as part of TO Shipment Feed', createdDate:nowDate]

return.message: Completed Transfer Order Shipment Feed file at time ${ec.user.nowTimestamp} with type ${systemMessageTypeId} and remote ${systemMessageRemoteId} saved response in messages ${shipmentFeedSysMsgOut?.systemMessageId}
